definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Harry Potter, boy wizard in the novels by J.K. Rowling 羅琳|罗琳

sentences.english: Well, for grad school, I'm probably going to go to Portland.
sentences.chinese: 對於進修的學校，我可能回去波特蘭。

sentences.english: Two downtown Portland parks where Occupy Portland demonstrators camped for weeks are clear Monday and police say crews will be removing debris and assessing damage.
sentences.chinese: 波特蘭兩個示威者宿營的城市公園在週一得到了清理。

sentences.english: So this was the reason for our trip to Portsea.
sentences.chinese: 這麼說，我們到波特西旅行就是這個原因。

sentences.english: The Portland Trailblazers have been doing bad this year.
sentences.chinese: 波特蘭開拓者是做壞今年。

sentences.english: In the summer of 1983, the governors met in Portland, Maine.
sentences.chinese: 1983年夏天，各州州長們聚集在緬因州的波特蘭。

sentences.english: I tried WOC Radio in Davenport, Iowa.
sentences.chinese: 我試着到愛荷華州達文波特的woc電臺去求職。

sentences.english: "Can Albert come out to play?" he asks.
sentences.chinese: “阿而波特能出來玩嗎”他問道。

sentences.english: It is used to set baud rate, parity check, number of data bits, stop bit.
sentences.chinese: 它是用來設置波特率，奇偶校驗，數據位數，停止位。

sentences.english: The Atlanta and Portland transit systems are also recording heavy usage.
sentences.chinese: 亞特蘭大和波特蘭的運輸系統也運務繁忙。

sentences.english: He took up lodgings at 4 Clarence Baths in Devonport.
sentences.chinese: 他在德文波特克拉倫斯澡堂4號住下。

sentences.english: Bill Porter is a 65-year-old Portlander with cerebral palsy.
sentences.chinese: 波特是一位患有腦癱的波特蘭老人。

sentences.english: Bill Porter is a 65-year-old Portlander with cerebral palsy.
sentences.chinese: 波特是一位患有腦癱的波特蘭老人。

sentences.english: Davenport describes the most effective style of leading as "offstage management."
sentences.chinese: 達文波特說，最有效的管理方式是“後臺管理”。

sentences.english: Boldt also recommends asking yourself what you enjoy thinking about learning about.
sentences.chinese: 波特還建議，要求自己什麼你喜歡思考學習。

sentences.english: To be a brave and good person, haling the one who is in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 波特是一個勇敢的人，他會幫助人解決麻煩。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
Brown (name)/Gordon Brown (1951-), UK politician, prime minister 2007-2010
